Name: Hi ! I am Cruiter ! I will help you with your application. Let's start by knowing your name
About: Awesome ! Now tell me about yourself - your strengths, weaknesses, hobbies, etc. (within 50 words)
Phno: Wow ! It was great knowing you ! Please share your contact no.
Email: If you don't mind please share your email id
Resume: Provide a link to your resume, so that I can share with the recruiter
Why: What do you think makes you fit for this role ?
End: I have shared your application. You may return to home page
